casebody.data:
Ardeal ROSEBORO
v.
John ROSEBORO, The Roseboro Law Firm, Womble Carlyle Sandridge & Rice, City of Winston-Salem, Winston-Salem Police Department, Barry D. Roundtree, and M.L. Bowens. No. 361P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. John Roseboro, Durham, Attorney at Law, for Roseboro, John. Anthony J. Baker, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Winston-Salem. Ardeal Roseboro, for Roseboro, Ardeal. Reid C. Adams, Jr., Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Womble Carlyle Sandridge & Rice.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 27th of October 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
